title: Maybe in May
body:
Instead of just saying: "HEY! Here's what we're showing in May," I'm going to show you a picture from each movie and let you figure it out. Most of them are pretty easy, but there might be one or two in there that you have to use your ol' noggin to figure out. As for the line-up, I'm really excited about it (especially the second to last one). Two of the movies we were hoping to show in May have been pushed back a month, which means our June calendar is all but scheduled... and it's going to be pretty dang spectacular. Ok, here come the May movies:


May 3 through 9


May 5 through 7


May 10 through 18


May 12, 13, 15, 16


May 10 through 18


May 19 through 30


May 20


May 25 through TBD

I'll be by later to confirm or deny your guesses... or, Master RJ will be by and guess them all correctly in his first guess. Either way, it's all good fun.
author: Dan

comments.author: Nate
comments.body: How hardcore does Peter Dinklage look?

comments.author: drtedd Says:
comments.body: Not near as hardcore as May 10-18

comments.author: Dr. Dre
comments.body: Nothing you idiot!  Dr. Dre's dead!  He's locked in my basement!

comments.author: Master RJ
comments.body:
3-9:Tsotsi
5-7:The Big Lebowski
10-18:Duck Season?
12-13, 15-16:Awesome: I F**kin' Shot That
10-18:Find Me Gulity
19-30:The Notorious Bettie Page
20:Arrested Development
25-TBD:The Promise (aka Master Of The Crimson Armor)

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: As always, RJ is dead on.

comments.author: Maddy
comments.body: Damn, and I had them... (not really)

comments.author: Caleb
comments.body:
Nice lineup! Who would have thunk it - Vin Diesel at the Moxie? That movie actually looks decent though, plus it has the station agent!

And while I do want to see The Promise, shouldn't there be a different movie in its spot? That really sucks you couldn't get it. Here's to June!

comments.author: brian of moore
comments.body:
May 5 through 7
is this a byowr event?

one of my favorite movies of all time... the big L
along with one of my favorite TV shows of all time.. AD
... is the moxie trying to court me? ...
shouldnt it have asked my father first?

ps - when *doesnt* peter dinklage look hardcore

comments.author: Nate
comments.body:
No, he looks SCARY hardcore in this one...like a Mini-Manson.


In The Station Agent he just looked grumpy.

comments.author: Master RJ
comments.body:
The Promise is actually going pretty wide for an art release (209 sites is the reported total), and will be expanding in later weeks. The audiences sure love Asian films.

Hard Candy in June!

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: I think THE PROMISE actually starts on 5/26. I'm pretty excited for it!
